article_text: The United Health Foundation recently named Kansas and Missouri among the seven states that have sunk the furthest on its list over the past 25 years. A robust Kansas was in 12th place in 1990; now it’s a middling 27th, according to the foundation’s America’s Health Rankings. Missouri used to be among the better half of states at 24th place; now it’s a dismal 36th.

article_summary:
A robust Kansas was in 12th place in 1990; now it’s a middling 27th, according to the foundation’s America’s Health Rankings.
The United Health Foundation recently named Kansas and Missouri among the seven states that have sunk the furthest on its list over the past 25 years.
Missouri used to be among the better half of states at 24th place; now it’s a dismal 36th.
